PC_BACKGROUNDS: <:_:979009081325019156> Backgrounds: Set background of your profile
PC_FAV_CHAR: <:_:979009081325019156> Favorite character: Set your favorite character
PC_SELECTED_CARD: <:_:979009081325019156> Selected card: Set image of selected card code
PC_TEXT_COLOR: <:_:979009081325019156> Profile Text Color: Change Text Color of your profile with glows
PC_GLOW: <:_:979009081325019156> Profile Glow: Glow your profile with glows

FC_MENU_DESC: Display your favorite character on profile
SC_MENU_DESC: Shows image of your selected card on profile
BG_MENU_DESC: Displays backgrounds to purchase for the profile
TC_MENU_DESC: Set profile text color with glow
AD_MENU_DESC: Choose awards to display on your profile
CAN_MENU_DESC: Stop the interaction and go back
